TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextMessageEncodingBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension, class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension
Public NotInheritable Class TextMessageEncodingBindingElement Inherits MessageEncodingBindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension, IWsdlExportExtension
type TextMessageEncodingBindingElement = class inherit MessageEncodingBindingElement interface IWsdlExportExtension interface IPolicyExportExtension

summary.span: 此繫結項目會指定用於 SOAP 文字訊息的字元編碼和訊息版本控制。

span.span: The binding element that specifies the character encoding and message versioning used for text-based SOAP messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼是將訊息轉換成位元組序列的處理序，Encoding is the process of transforming a message into a sequence of bytes. 解碼則是相反的處理序。Decoding is the reverse process. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 包含 SOAP 訊息的三種編碼類型：文字、二進位和訊息傳輸最佳化機制 (MTOM)。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) includes three types of encoding for SOAP messages: Text, Binary and Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM). 所代表的文字編碼為最具互通性，但針對 XML 訊息編碼器的效率最為不彰。The text encoding represented by the is the most interoperable, but the least efficient encoder for XML messages. Web 服務或 Web 服務用戶端通常可以了解文字 XML。Web service or Web service client can generally understand textual XML. 不過，將大型二進位資料區塊當做文字來傳輸是沒有效率的。However, transmitting large blocks of binary data as text is not efficient. 如需有關指定訊息使用編碼之繫結項目的.NET 二進位格式，對於 XML，請參閱。For more information about the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using the .NET Binary Format for XML, see . 如需有關繫結項目，指定訊息使用編碼 MTOM 訊息編碼，請參閱。For more information about the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using the MTOM message encoding, see . 如需如何實作自訂訊息編碼器的詳細資訊，請使用類別。For more information about how to implement a custom message encoder, use the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此建構函式的預設 為 WS-Addressing 1.0 與 SOAP 1.2 的版本。The default for this constructor is the version of WS-Addressing 1.0 and SOAP 1.2. 預設的文字編碼是 UTF-8 格式。The default text encoding is the UTF-8 format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Clone () As BindingElement

summary.span: 新建一個從目前 物件初始化的這類物件。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized from the current one.

returns.span: 屬性值與目前項目相等的 物件。

span.span: A object with property values equal to those of the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這會建立目前繫結項目物件樹狀結構的完整複本 (也稱為深層複製)。This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone. 物件的深層複製會建立物件的複本，以及該物件直接或間接參考之每個物件的複本，A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. 這個動作稱為複製整個物件圖形。傳回深層複製可讓執行階段支援多個自訂繫結共用自訂繫結項目的情況。(This is called copying the entire object graph.) Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果沒有傳回深層複製，則表示執行階段行為尚未定義。If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined. 相較之下，物件的淺層複製則只是物件的複本。A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果物件包含其他物件的參考，則淺層複製不會建立所參考之物件的複本，而只會複製原始物件的參考。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

Public Overrides Function CreateMessageEncoderFactory () As MessageEncoderFactory

summary.span: 建立文字訊息編碼器處理站，這個處理站會採用目前編碼繫結項目所指定的訊息版本與字元編碼。

span.span: Creates a factory for text message encoders that employs the message version and character encoding specified by the current encoding binding element.
The that this factory creates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理站產生的 物件可從資料流讀取訊息，並將訊息寫入訊息編碼特定類型的資料流中。The objects that the factory produces can read messages from a stream and write them to a stream for specific types of message encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: public override T GetProperty<T> (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) where T : class;
.method public hidebysig virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) (context As BindingContext) As T

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 此方法正在查詢的型別物件。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.
The for the binding element.

summary.span: 從繫結項目堆疊的適當層次中，傳回要求的型別物件 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack.

returns.span: 要求的型別物件 (如果存在的話)，如果不存在則為 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可要求型別物件，用來從繫結項目堆疊中的適當層次設定屬性或取得狀態的介面。Use this to request a typed object for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack. 如果某個層次支援傳回要求的物件，它就會傳回物件。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不是，則會將呼叫向下委派到堆疊中的下一層。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到達堆疊的底部，而且沒有任何繫結項目層次支援要求的物件，則該方法會傳回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no binding element layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxReadPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxReadPoolSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定寫入器的數目，這些是配置於集區、準備用來處理傳入訊息的寫入器。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of readers that are allocated to a pool and ready for use to process incoming messages.
The number of readers in the pool.

value.span: 預設值為 64 個讀取器。

span.span: The default value is 64 readers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增加這個數字會增加記憶體消耗量，但是可讓編碼器做好處理傳入訊息量突然暴增的準備，因為編碼器可以使用集區中已經建立的讀取器，而不必建立新的讀取器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of incoming messages because it is able to use readers from the pool that have already been created instead of creating new ones.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWritePoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxWritePoolSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定寫入器的數目，這些是配置於集區、準備用來處理傳出訊息的寫入器。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of writers that are allocated to a pool and ready for use to process outgoing messages.

value.span: 要保存在集區中的寫入器數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of writers to be kept in the pool.

value.span: 預設值為 16 個寫入器。

span.span: The default value is 16 writers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增加這個數字會增加記憶體消耗量，但是可讓編碼器做好處理傳出訊息量突然暴增的準備，因為編碼器可以使用集區中已經建立的寫入器，而不必建立新的寫入器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of outgoing messages because it is able to use writers from the pool that have already been created instead of creating new ones.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 訊息複雜性的條件約束，而這些條件約束可由以此繫結所設定的端點處理。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: ，指定已交換之 SOAP 訊息的複雜度條件約束。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged.

value.span: 接下來的「備註」一節提供了這些條件約束的預設值。

span.span: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複雜性條件約束可以防止嘗試使用訊息複雜性困住端點處理資源的阻絕服務 (DOS) 攻擊類別。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示這些條件約束及其預設值的屬性包括：The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384

returns.span: 如果 SOAP 訊息條件約束應該序列化，則為 ，否則為 。

summary.span: 取得或設定用於格式化文字訊息字元的編碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding that is used to format the characters in the text message.

value.span: 用來格式化文字訊息字元的 。

span.span: The that is used to format the characters in the text message.

value.span: 預設的文字編碼是 UTF-8 格式。

span.span: The default text encoding is the UTF-8 format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指定的內容類型，例如"utf-16"XML 宣告需要訊息中。When specifying a content type such as "utf-16" an XML declaration is required in the message. 或者您可以指定"utf 16LE"或"utf 16BE"並不需要 XML 宣告。Alternatively you can specify either "utf-16LE" or "utf-16BE" and an XML declaration is not required.

span.span: The value is .
value is not valid.
